ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Fixed ZWave interface sensor timeout bug and sensor Status.Level "0.01" bug - Disabled limit of max one opened http connection per program in NetHelper - Improved media server widget with thumbnails and support for multiple bitrates and formats - Added UPnP interface command "AvMedia.GetItem" - Improved camera widget - Fixed 'continuous Event Stream disconnection' bug when running on old mono ARM-hf (eg. Raspberry Pi) - Updated Spanish locales - Disabled periodic Weather Underground program notifications in the UI - Reverted XTenLib to the using of Thread instead of Task
